EmailTemplate.description: Letting the Business Manager know that a deal is tagged
EmailTemplate.name: Deal is Tagged
EmailTemplate.subject: A Deal has been Tagged
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there awesome Business Manager,
Please be advised that {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Name} is now tagged. This is a {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Payment_Method__c} deal. If it's finance, go do your Business Manager thing, if it's cash go get the License Plate and Boat Numbers. Also, just continue being amazing, you're really good at that :)
Thanks!
